titleInfo.title: Map of the area west of Ma‘arrat an Nu‘mān, Syria; list of buildings for Dr David George Hogarth

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the first folio with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 2; these numbers are written in pencil, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Map of the area west of Ma‘arrat an Nu‘mān, Syria (f 1), and handwritten list of buildings, created by Gertrude Margaret Lowthian Bell, for which plans and notes were required by David George Hogarth (f 2). The list includes: Qasr al-Azarak [Qasr Azraq], Qasr al-Amra [Qasr Amra], Qasr al-Kharaneh [Qasr Kharana], Jordan.
